channel.title: Something is up with my yell command

item.title: Something is up with my yell command
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

Well that’s odd. I compiled after closing my client.java this time and it all popped up. That answers my second question. Thanks to everyone who helped. I would rep you but i have no clue how.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2008, 12:04:39 am[/size][hr]Ok now i seem to have a problem with the starters and the starting spot. I found the starter and changed it to what i wanted on client.java, but still the same starter as it was before. And the starting spot confuses me. It has same x y coords of all the other locations but above it is something with limits to the coords. If anyone has any idea how to help i would appreciate it. If you dont understand i can post more info just when i get some time.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2008, 12:06:31 am[/size][hr]bump plz

Read full topic

The only thing is that i just save the client.java and do not close it. Do i have to close the notepad file before compiling or would that affect it in any way?

item.source: Something is up with my yell command

item.title: Something is up with my yell command
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Use mine.

        if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 0) {
			String text = command.substring(4);
				yell("[ Global ] "+playerName+": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

Your basic problem is your Sub String. Yell is 4, not 5.

[quote=“Jamie14, post:4, topic:250261”]My Deltascape Yell Command

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { yell("["+playerName+"]: " + command.substring(5)); }[/quote]
Your conventions SUCK

Read full topic

item.title: Something is up with my yell command
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

Well i have seen many other delta sources with a yell command could you give me a link to a tut explaining how to add the messageToAll. Once again i am a noob and want to get my server edited before i start it up. Also for some reason when i edit starters and add objects the effects show up in the client.java but on the actual game nothing changes. I cannot makeGlobalobject, but i can deletethatobject. Any help on that one would be greatly appreciated too.

Read full topic

item.source: Something is up with my yell command

item.title: Something is up with my yell command
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

I am a noob and i know that. I am not, I repeat, NOT A LEECHER. I just cant figure out whats up with this code.

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
String text = command.substring(5);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + ": "
+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
+ text.substring(1) + “”;

}[/code]

No errors when i compile but it, but it will not yell over the server. I dont want to be spoon fed, but i just started and need some help on what to do. Also if anyone has any code or tut on blocking muted yells that would be appreciated. Source is delta if you need to know. All the codes i do work on other servers but will not work with delta for some odd reason =/.

Read full topic
